I am a web developer
in Canton, Georgia.

Having initially started my education in fine arts, I enjoy making functional solutions that also appeal to the eye. When not in front of the computer, I enjoy all things food and music. You can find me watching a Braves games, with family and friends, gardening with my dog, riding my horse, or simply reading a book by myself.

I'm always interested in creating or collaborating!
